Describtion The project was on behalf of Pennsylvania State government The resident of the state will get some benefits from the government and that heshe can view through a website Responsibilities Involved in developing and maintaining the web applications on the website Participating in all phases of software development life cycle SDLC analysis design development unit test debug production move support maintain and update documents Developed and tested with client side MVC style frameworks such as AngularJs Developing webservices for different functionalities in the application using REST architecture Created digital templates using front end code using HTML CSS and JavaScript to interface with backend code Used advanced CSS techniques as well as Bootstrap in order to solve UI issues Managed project communication Including status updates to key internal persons Worked on development production and delivery of digital advertising templates Performed troubleshooting and Jboss Application Server Developed Graphical User Interfaces using UI frameworks Angular JS and WebPages using HTML for user interaction Created and modifed the views in Spring framework so as to mask the appearance of URLs to end users Created RESTful web services interface to Javabased runtime engine and accounts Worked on Mongo DB for storing the security related information Worked with testing team analyzed and fixed the production defects and deployed the applications on the server Environment JavaScript Angular JS Java15J2EE HTML CSS DHTML JBoss Oracle9i10g SOAP REST jQuery JSP Spring
